name: Panda Sprites
description:
Hey, I'm new in pixelart and this is my first spritesheet, so if you would like, leave a tip at comments...

Info:

Each sprite is 13x13 size -> Panda-Spritesheet(13x13_each).png

The image size is 52x52 -> Panda-Spritesheet(13x13_each).png

At zip file are four folders (up, down, left, right) 

-> Sprites(splited_26x26_each).zip

  

Note:

If you are going to use this in any project, give me the credits.
